Henri Desfontaines https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henri_Desfontaines 0 Henri Desfontaines (12 November 1876, Paris – 7 January 1931, Paris) was a French film director, actor and scriptwriter. Henri_Desfontaines ( 12_November_1876 , Paris – 7_January_1931 , Paris ) was a_French_film_director , actor_and_scriptwriter .
